about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hi, I'm Afnane El Idrissi Salmi, a Full Stack Developer passionate about building elegant and scalable web applications.
about.p2: I study at ISTA and specialize in modern frontend and backend technologies.
about.p3: I love transforming ideas into clean, efficient, and user-friendly digital experiences.
